sentences.en: A cut in interest rates will help the country’s moribund housing market.
sentences.cn: 利率的下调对于该国疲软的住房市场将起到促进作用。

sentences.en: A third way in which seemingly moribund technologies can be revived is through an external shock.
sentences.cn: 第三个使技术起死回生的力量来自外部的剧变.

sentences.en: As a result, beginning in the late 1970 s , China's moribund economy warp speed.
sentences.cn: 于是, 从1970年代末开始, 中国停滞不前的经济极速发展.

sentences.en: DOTCOMS may be moribund , but inside companies, the Internet is still finding cost - saving new uses.
sentences.cn: 网络公司(DOTCOMS)也许即将灭亡, 但是在公司内部, 因特网仍然是节省成本的新办法.

sentences.en: For more on the group, check out the moribund official Web site.
sentences.cn: 欲了解更多的组, 检查了奄奄一息的官方网站.

sentences.en: French political - philosophical thought , which impressed the world in the 1950 s and 1960 s, is moribund.
sentences.cn: 曾令二十世纪五、六十年代的世界为之瞩目的法国政治哲学思想, 现在也已死气沉沉.

sentences.en: Imperialism is monopolistic, parasitic and moribund capitalism.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义是垄断的 、 寄生的、垂死的资本主义.

sentences.en: One is whether separatism is quite as moribund as it now seems.
sentences.cn: 其一就是,分离主义是否真的如同目前所见那样垂死挣扎.

sentences.en: That is another blow to the moribund housing market, which had shown signs of stabilising.
sentences.cn: 这是对死气沉沉的房市的又一打击,而这房产市场刚刚显出稳定迹象.

sentences.en: The British music scene is nostalgic, decrepit and moribund.
sentences.cn: 英国音乐呈现出感伤怀旧、暮气沉沉、行将就木的景象。

sentences.en: The few birds seen anywhere were moribund.
sentences.cn: 随处看见寥寥无几的鸟儿在垂死挣扎.

sentences.en: The giant star - forming galaxies and voracious black holes of the universe's past are now moribund.
sentences.cn: 过去在宇宙中形成恒星的巨大星系与狼吞虎咽的黑洞,现在都处于停滞状态.

sentences.en: The moribund Post Office Advisory Board was replaced.
sentences.cn: 这个不起作用的邮局顾问委员会已被替换.

sentences.en: The patient was moribund by the time the doctor arrived.
sentences.cn: 医生赶到的时候病人已经奄奄一息。

sentences.en: The region’s heavy industry is still inefficient and moribund.
sentences.cn: 该地区的重工业依然效率低下，没有活力。

trans.tran_cn: 濒死的，垂死的，奄奄一息的，停滞不前的
trans.tran_en: a moribund organization, industry, etc is no longer active or effective and may be coming to an end
